long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab+ is an extension that replaces the page you see when you open a new tab. You get a cool background from Unsplash along with the time, a customizable random message, and three customizable shortcuts. You can import your own backgrounds as long as they're hosted on the internet, pick a favorite color, change the font, or use the bing image of the day. You can also reposition elements until you find what works for you.

Features:
- Sync across devices
- Three custom shortcuts
- Daily goal
- Custom or preset messages
- Reposition elements
- Custom fonts
- Bing image of the day
- Built in nature backgrounds
- Custom background images
- Background filters (darken, blur, grayscale, and vignette)
